items.title: Tim Walz launches bid for reelection as Minnesota governor amid 2028 speculation

items.title: Trump heads to U.K. for carefully choreographed state visit
items.description: President Donald Trump returns to the U.K. at the invitation of King Charles III, for a trip designed to avoid controversy and protests.
